extends java.lang.Object

    A class representing a chauffeur

    0.2, 12/12/2016
    Author:
    Krystof Spiller

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chauffeur

        public Chauffeur(java.lang.String fullName,
                 java.lang.String address,
                 java.lang.String ID,
                 java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                 java.lang.String emailAddress,
                 boolean fullTime)
        Six-argument constructor. String representing wishes of a chauffeur is set to a empty string. Schedules variable is initialized as an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the full name of a chauffeur as a String
        address - the address of a chauffeur as a String
        ID - the 5-digit unique employee id as a String
        phoneNumber - the phone number as a String
        emailAddress - the email address as a String
        fullTime - boolean representing if a chauffeur is a full time employee (true) or not (false)

      • getSchedules

        public Schedule[] getSchedules()
        Converts an arraylist to an array and returns it.
        Returns:
        the schedules as an array of Schedule objects

      • getWeekSchedule

        public boolean[][] getWeekSchedule()
        Compares following 168 hours with all the schedules for the chauffeur. If an hour is overlaping with bus schedule, the respective hour is set to true in a two dimensional array. First dimension represents the number of days, second number of hours in a day.
        Returns:
        the week schedule as a two dimensional array of booleans

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(DateTime from,
                           DateTime to)
        Checks if the chauffeur is available in a given date interval
        Parameters:
        from - Starting date as an object of type DateTime
        to - Ending date as an object of type DateTime
        Returns:
        true if the chauffeur is available

      • getHoursWorkedThisMonth

        public int getHoursWorkedThisMonth()
        Calculates how many hours a chauffeur worked in current month
        Returns:
        number of hours worked this month as an integer

      • setFullName

        public void setFullName(java.lang.String fullName)
        Sets the full name of a chauffeur. Capitalizes the first letter of the inputed string.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the full name of a chauffeur as a String

      • setAddress

        public void setAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Sets the address of a chauffeur.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of a chauffeur as a String

      • setID

        public void setID(java.lang.String ID)
        Sets the 5-digit unique employee id of a chauffeur. Inputed ID has to be 5 characters long, otherwise exception for illegal argument is thrown.
        Parameters:
        ID - the ID of a chauffeur as a String

      • setPhoneNumber

        public void setPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Sets the phone number of a chauffeur. Inputed string is processed so prefix for Denmark is erased if it's present, spaces are deleted and the resulting string is checked if it consists only of 8 digits. Otherwise exception for illegal argument is thrown
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number of a chauffeur as a String

      • setEmailAddress

        public void setEmailAddress(java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Sets the email address of a chauffeur. Inputed string is not a valid email address if '@' (at sign) is the first letter, the last letter or isn't in the sting at all. In one or more of these cases, the exception for illegal argument is thrown.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - The email address of a chauffeur as a String

      • setFullTime

        public void setFullTime(boolean fullTime)
        Sets if a chauffeur is a full time employee or not.
        Parameters:
        fullTime - boolean representing if a chauffeur is a full time employee (true) or not (false)

      • setWishes

        public void setWishes(java.lang.String wishes)
        Sets the wishes of a chauffeur.
        Parameters:
        wishes - the wishes of a chauffeur as a String

      • addSchedule

        public void addSchedule(Schedule schedule)
        Add a schedule to chauffeur's schedules only if the inputed schedule doesn't overlap with other schedules. Otherwise it has no effect.
        Parameters:
        schedule - an object of type Schedule

      • removeSchedule

        public void removeSchedule(Schedule schedule)
        Removes a schedule from chauffeur's schedules.
        Parameters:
        schedule - an object of type Schedule
